title: Bilingual Refinement Studio Language Switch
description: Verify that switching languages in the Bilingual Refinement Studio forces editor remounts and clears the previously shown content, preventing content persistence across English and Hindi modes.

steps.description: Open the Bilingual Refinement Studio in English mode.
Enter sample question content in English.
Switch the editor language to Hindi.
Check that the English content is cleared and Hindi mode editor is empty.
Enter sample question content in Hindi.
Switch back to English.
Verify that Hindi content is cleared and English editor is empty or shows previously saved English content correctly after editor remount.

title: Bilingual Refinement Studio 3-Column Layout Verification
description: Verify the presence and correct layout of the 3 columns for Question, Answers/Logic, and Metadata in the Bilingual Refinement Studio.

steps.description: Open the Bilingual Refinement Studio.
Confirm that three columns labelled Question, Answers/Logic, and Metadata are visible and properly aligned.
Verify that content can be entered and scrolled independently in each column.

title: Undo/Redo Functionality in Rich Text Editor
description: Verify that the Undo and Redo stacks function correctly allowing users to revert and restore their editing changes consistently.

steps.description: Open the Advanced Rich Text Editor.
Enter some text content.
Make several edits by adding, deleting, and formatting text.
Trigger Undo multiple times.
Confirm that text reverts step by step correctly to previous states.
Trigger Redo multiple times.
Confirm that undone changes are restored step by step correctly.

title: Math Symbol Insertion in Rich Text Editor
description: Verify that the Math Symbol insertion tool correctly inserts appropriate mathematical symbols into the editor at cursor position.

steps.description: Open the Advanced Rich Text Editor in a question creation form.
Place cursor inside the editor text area.
Select and insert various mathematical symbols (e.g., ∑, ∫, √, π) from the Math Symbol insertion tool.
Verify that each selected symbol is inserted at the correct cursor position within the text.

title: Font Size Control in Rich Text Editor
description: Verify that changing font size via the Font Size control updates the selected text accordingly and persists upon saving.

steps.description: Enter a sample paragraph into the Advanced Rich Text Editor.
Select a portion of the text.
Change font size using the Font Size control to various sizes (small, medium, large).
Check that the font size of the selected text changes immediately as per selection.
Save changes and reload the editor.
Confirm that the font size changes persist after reload.

title: Text and Background Color Pickers Functionality
description: Validate that text color and background color pickers update the selected text style accurately in real-time and persist on save.

steps.description: Input text into the Advanced Rich Text Editor.
Select a section of the text.
Change the text color using the text color picker.
Verify the selected text color updates immediately.
Change the background color of the selected text using the background color picker.
Verify the background color updates immediately.
Save changes and reload editor.
Ensure the selected colors persist after reload.

title: Code View (HTML Source) Editing and Formatting
description: Ensure Code View toggle enables source HTML editing with proper syntax formatting and changes are reflected when switching back to visual editor.

steps.description: Open the Advanced Rich Text Editor.
Enter some formatted content (text with bold, color, and math symbols).
Toggle to Code View to edit HTML source.
Verify displayed HTML source is correctly formatted and represents the visual content.
Edit the HTML source code, such as changing tags or content.
Toggle back to visual editor mode.
Confirm the visual editor reflects the updated source content properly.

title: Toolbar Layout and Accessibility in Rich Text Editor
description: Check that the toolbar is intuitively laid out with all controls accessible, properly labeled, and keyboard navigable.

steps.description: Open the Advanced Rich Text Editor.
Verify all expected toolbar buttons and controls are visible and correctly labeled with tooltips.
Navigate toolbar using keyboard (Tab and arrow keys).
Ensure focus moves appropriately and controls are operable via keyboard only.
